reviewText: Just a great tape, a most amazing comeback for one of the all-time greats.
This has got to my the capstone of Phil's career.  To win the "Open" was the most difficult golfing challenge Phil ever faced and he came through like the great champion that he is.  Well done!
The DVD cut out Phil's birdie putts. A lot in my opinion. At least, you should have all birdies in the back 9 on Sunday. Big disappointed.
Great summary of the Open and one of the finest rounds of golf ever played . . . Mickelson is an all-star champion.
Great recap of the open.  A bit odd as the angle is from the British announcers and not from American - but once you realize that, it's quite enjoyable.

This is a very good recap of the 2013 Open where Phil Mickelson finally wins the one major he thought he would never win. It does a great job of telling the story of how he got it done. Any fan of Phil will want to get this.

Fantastic ! Can't watch it enough !  Phil coming from 5 back and beating Woods, Scott , Westwood and Stenson by 3 shots is great theater!!  They should have included Phil's  Sunday victory press conference though.
